item.title: US Bank
item.description:
Feature / Type ACH Transfer
ACH转账		 Global ACH
全球ACH转账		 Wire Transfer
电汇		 Direct Deposit
直接存款
Speed
速度		 Usually 1-2 business days
通常1-2个工作日		 1-5 business days, depending on the country
1-5个工作日，取决于国家		 Several hours to 1 business day
数小时到1个工作日		 Usually within 1 business day
通常在1个工作日内
Fees
费用		 Low to none
低至无费用		 Moderate, varies by country
中等费用，根据国家而异		 High
高费用		 None or very low
无费用或很低费用
Geographic Scope
适用范围		 Domestic
国内支付		 International
国际支付		 Domestic and international
国内外均可		 Primarily domestic
主要是国内支付
Main Uses
主要用途		 Routine transactions like bill payments
日常交易，如账单支付		 Cross-border payroll and supplier payments
跨国界的雇员工资和供应商支付		 Large, urgent, or international transfers
大额、紧急或国际转账		 Payroll, benefits, pensions, etc.
工资、福利、退休金等定期支付
Transaction Limits
交易限额		 Usually capped
通常有上限		 May be capped, varies by policy
可能有上限，取决于国家政策		 Usually unlimited or very high
通常无限额或非常高的限额		 Usually unlimited
通常无限额
Automation
自动化程度		 Can be set for recurring payments
可设置周期性支付		 Can be set for recurring payments
可设置周期性支付		 Manual for each transaction
需要手动执行每笔交易		 Fully automated, set up for regular payments
完全自动化，设定后定期支付
Processing Institutions
处理机构		 Processed by banks and financial institutions
通过银行和金融机构处理		 Processed by specific international payment platforms
通过特定的国际支付平台处理		 Processed by banks and financial institutions
通过银行和金融机构处理		 Processed by employers and banks
通过雇主和银行处理

Record

05/03/2024
Get $300 with a new Everyday Checking account | Wells Fargo
